subject: testing 'Applets' using either htmlunit or jWebUnit
msgSnippet: Hi all, We use applets on a few web pages within our J2EE based web app. Is there any unit testing framework available that supports applets? Appreciate your
messageBody:
Hi all,
We use applets on a few web pages within our
J2EE based web app. Is there any unit testing
framework available that supports applets? Appreciate
your help.

I know htmlunit simulates a browser environment, but
not sure if it supports applets.

Thank you
Srini
